results.title: Oral metformin-ascorbic acid co-administration ameliorates alcohol-induced hepatotoxicity in rats.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases_Alcoholic @DISEASE_MESH:D008108 @@@Alcoholic liver disease@@@ remains a major cause of @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver failure@@@ worldwide with no available curative or prophylactic therapy as at present. High dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is reported to ameliorate @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injuries@@@ in both @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ and animal models of @<m>DISEASE_Acute_On_Chronic_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065290 @@@acute and chronic alcoholic liver injuries@@@.
